summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) training record for a staff member, listing various mandatory and refresher courses completed between 2017 and 2019. The courses cover correctional practices, security, trauma-informed care, and compliance with acts like the Prison Rape Elimination Act (PREA).
keyFacts: The document is a BOP staff training record covering courses from 2017 to 2019.
Training topics include correctional practices, firearms certification, trauma-informed care, and Prison Rape Elimination Act (PREA) compliance.
The record indicates ongoing annual refresher training requirements for BOP staff.
The document is marked as containing sensitive but not classified information and includes handling instructions.
The training record was run or compiled on June 24, 2020.
